headline: Jamie Dimon Reportedly Blasted Brian Armstrong In Davos: 'You Are Full Of...'
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) CEO Brian Armstrong reportedly faced harsh criticism from Wall Street’s biggest bank chiefs at the World Economic Forum in Davos. The Davos Showdown JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) CEO Jamie Dimon interrupted Armstrong’s coffee meeting with former U.K. Prime Minister Tony Blair to confront him directly according to a Wall Street Journal feature published on Friday. “You are full of s—,” Dimon said with his index finger pointed at Armstrong’s face, telling him to stop

content.title: Jamie Dimon Reportedly Blasted Brian Armstrong In Davos: 'You Are Full Of...'
content.summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) CEO Brian Armstrong reportedly faced harsh criticism from Wall Street’s biggest bank chiefs at the World Economic Forum in Davos. The Davos Showdown JPMorgan Chase (NYSE:JPM) CEO Jamie Dimon interrupted Armstrong’s coffee meeting with former U.K. Prime Minister Tony Blair to confront him directly according to a Wall Street Journal feature published on Friday. “You are full of s—,” Dimon said with his index finger pointed at Armstrong’s face, telling him to stop
